name: Orderless: New Skies
description:
Orderless: New Skies is a 2D action-turn RPG where you can avoid attacks and deal extra damage by timing your button presses. Experience a unique artstyle set in an alien world where brutalist architecture meets organic life.

[Please note that this project is very early in development. Many issues still exist but will be fixed throughout development.]

Please answer this form after playing to give us some feedback!
https://forms.gle/ufLG2fRSpQB7EA3z5

Supported Controllers: [Keyboard], [Xbox Gamepad]
